Publications (selected):

9059-9063.

transforming growth factor-8 receptors and growth inhibitory responses in retinoblastoma cells,
Science 240: 196-199.

summary: The application includes the name of the applicant, the position he or she holds, and references to all publications during the past three years. The application is in the form of a single sheet of paper, with the information about the person on each page in chronological order. For confidential support, call the Samaritans on 08457 909090 or visit a local Samaritan branch, see www.samaritans.org for details.
